text:
Service is quite fast, even tho i can see that staff are struggling. The burger was so good especially the whopper. The texture of the patty was so crisp and burnt with actual fire.
I love how the place was do clean, as a customer who is very nitpicky about the cleanliness, this store exceeds my expectations. I will definitely come back here again. Thank you Burger King!
Wished they had a better variety for breakfast. Place is new and clean but heavily infested with houseflies. Otherwise great new place.

I had a great experience at Burger King thanks to the excellent customer service provided by Zulfadhli. He was friendly, attentive, and made sure everything was perfect with my order. It's refreshing to be served by someone who genuinely cares about the customers. Keep up the great work!
Very nice place to eat and relax. Food was serve fresh and hot. Friendly staff☺️☺️
Very clean restaurant with very welcoming hospitable employees
